name: UP Diliman CRS: Light Blue
description: A [WORK-IN-PROGRESS] light blue theme for the UP Diliman CRS. Download and install Roboto for best viewing experience. This style is currently WIP, so pardon if some elements still look like shit. Found any unreadable text/unusable feature? Email them to me, and I'll fix them right away. jeromeindefenzo[ @ ]gmail.com

user.name: JeMhUnTeR
user.about: CC0 licenses on all my styles. Feel free to use all my work. No credit required, but would highly be appreciated if you do.

additional_info:
CHANGELOG

GMT+8, 22 December 2014, 08:17
Content styles part 2. Tabs, tables, and everything. Next up is the announcements/delinquencies tabs on the home module, and perhaps the header styles and paddings.

GMT+8, 22 December 2014, 00:09
Public homepage login revamp.

GMT+8, 21 December 2014, 23:56
Fix subheader z-index.

GMT+8, 21 December 2014, 23:48
Content styles part 1. Forms, inputs, and buttons all styled.

GMT+8, 20 December 2014, 00:00
Initial release. Features modified header and sidebar. Content styles coming up soon.
